title: There's a bunch of secret dialogue in Cyberpunk 2077's main quest if you beat Phantom Liberty first, and some of it feels like groundwork for future Cyberpunk stories
description: Fun attention to detail, but also some hardcore Cyberpunk deep lore.

title: My favorite indie Elder Scrolls-alike has finally added its take on the series' best spell
description: I want a train of ugly little skeleton guys following me around everywhere.

title: Check out the playtest of magic school simulator Mind Over Magic
description: It's published by Don't Starve and Oxygen Not Included developer Klei.

title: Overwatch harnesses the dread power of K-Pop
description: Overwatch's first in-game musical collaboration will be appropriate, if you're D.Va.

title: Watching an actual civil engineer nerd out over Cities: Skylines 2 is some of the most wholesome city building content out there
description: Real Civil Engineer is over here getting distracted by sewage pipes.

title: Final Fantasy 14's director promises to make an ultra-challenging achievement for the player who earned every single one, if they want
description: Hey Warrior of Light, we heard you like achievements...

title: Final Fantasy 14's director really wants to do a crossover with Diablo
description: It's one of Naoki Yoshida's dream collaborations.

title: Wordle today: Hint and answer for #855 Sunday, October 22
description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: Terrifyingly fun roguelike World of Horror launches with an absolute banger of a trailer
description: The parade of terrors and mysteries to explore in this point-and-click RPG are unmatched.

title: Inkle's scripting language, Ink, has Unreal integration thanks to Bloodlines 2 developers The Chinese Room
description: One less reason to use Unity.

title: This combo of Surviving Mars with factory building has you automate and expand a lunar colony in the wake of disaster
description: In The Crust it's up to your trusty drones to save the day.
